data.text:
@trackthedream We need American oil!
Open the pipelines!

@trackthedream Can we all agree that mRNA COVID-19 vaccines aren’t vaccines in the medical and legal definition of a vaccine. They do not prevent you from getting the infection, nor do they prevent its spread. They’re really experimental gene therapies.

@trackthedream @Barbarajdurkin Wish we would stop using CDC language - these Covid injections are experimental in nature and do not fit the traditional definition of a “vaccine”.  Vaccine = to prevent disease or illness
